name: Wreckt
description:
>WASD to drive the car

>Left Click to shoot

>Right Click to Deploy the Pipe Bomb

Survive as many waves as you can. If you run out of ammo there are boxes scattered throughout the map.

This game was made for a Pass the Project Challenge by Walter, GeekZebra, TheSleepyKoala, and myself.

You can watch the video here [TBA].
